description:
We live in a world of *concurrent* code and *multi-core* computing, so
come learn about a *new* solution for both in Python 3.12. We'll quickly
explain the new feature (and an old one), and then show you how to take
advantage of it, for *simpler* concurrency and *faster* code.
title: A Per-Interpreter GIL: Concurrency and Parallelism with Subinterpreters
